ExternalData.Subtitlesect: International Wheat Agreement, 1986: (b) Food Aid Convention, 1986*
ExternalData.EIF: 1 July 1986, in accordance with article XXI(2). The Agreement was extended until 30 June 1991, 30 June 1993 and 30 June 1995, respectively, and was terminated in accordance with its provisions on 30 June 1995.
